channel.title: Comments on: What makes a house a home?

item.title: By: Tamara
item.dc:creator: Tamara
item.description: having one's own private space where people won't bother you.
item.content:encoded: having one’s own private space where people won’t bother you.

item.title: By: Carol
item.dc:creator: Carol
item.description: A comfy sofa to snuggle on, and a warm bed to sleep in
item.content:encoded: A comfy sofa to snuggle on, and a warm bed to sleep in

item.title: By: Rand
item.dc:creator: Rand
item.description:
For me, it's when it's been irrevocably customised. I always have several unfinished DIY projects which means I can never sell now.
The "when it's been screwed on the desk" quote comes to mind.
item.content:encoded:
For me, it’s when it’s been irrevocably customised.
I always have several unfinished DIY projects which means I can never sell now.

The “when it’s been screwed on the desk” quote comes to mind.

item.title: By: Matthew
item.dc:creator: Matthew
item.description: Curtains. Non-home houses tend not to have them, workplaces tend to have blinds, therefore curtains make homes.
item.content:encoded: Curtains. Non-home houses tend not to have them, workplaces tend to have blinds, therefore curtains make homes.

item.title: By: Tim Dobson
item.dc:creator: Tim Dobson
item.description: Chaotic mess. no clear flat surfaces. washing up that still hasn't been done peeling wallpaper summary: various day to day imperfections.....
item.content:encoded:
Chaotic mess.
no clear flat surfaces.
washing up that still hasn’t been done
peeling wallpaper
summary: various day to day imperfections…..

item.title: By: Caius Durling
item.dc:creator: Caius Durling
item.description:
Or car.
Or Beer.
Most probably Beer actually, I know its my home when I have my beer chilling in the fridge and my car outside.
item.content:encoded:
Or car.

Or Beer.

Most probably Beer actually, I know its my home when I have my beer chilling in the fridge and my car outside.
